summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of RETAIL LAYOUT CORE v1. Tested header sticky behavior, hero carousel, advantages strip, product grid, deal of day, cart drawer, and mobile responsiveness at 768px.

ui_bugs.issue: Header sticky behavior partially working - header has position:sticky but scrolls out of view when scrolling down
Drawer animation position detection shows transform matrix instead of expected translateX value

issues: Deal of Day component uses Tailwind classes instead of ys-deal CSS classes
Hero carousel content not using ys-hero classes from layout-core.css

passed_tests: Header components present: logo, search input, search button, cart, favorites, user icons
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
Advantages Strip with exactly 6 items and icons
4-column product grid (ys-grid-4) responsive to 2-column on mobile
Cart drawer functionality - opens and closes properly
Mobile responsiveness at 768px - header height adjusts, navigation hidden, logo font size reduced
Core ys-* CSS classes implemented: ys-container (13), ys-section (11), ys-header (1), ys-grid-4 (1), ys-advantages (1), ys-advantage (6)
Footer present with contact information and links
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor CSS class consistency issues: DealOfDay component should use ys-deal classes from layout-core.css instead of Tailwind for better consistency with the layout system. Header sticky behavior could be improved to prevent scrolling out of view.
